MasterAnswered on 05 Nov 2018Have sufficient money in case of rainy days (~6 months salary)Invest using only money you can part withResearch before doing anything, dont blindly follow the crowdIf the deal sounds too good to be true, it probably isKnow your objectivesRead widely0 comments1
